entity.title: Product Catalog Inventory Facility Applicability Entity

view-entity.title: ProductCategoryRollup And ProductCategoryRole View Entity
view-entity.description: Allow the lookup of a category that is in another category that a party/role is related to. So, the party/role is related to the parent category.

entity.title: Product Price Automatic Notice History Entity

view-entity.title: Virtual and Associated Product Prices View Entity
view-entity.description: When using this to get an associated product price summary the only columns you should request are: productId, productName, assocProductCount, assocMinPrice, assocMaxPrice. The rest of the field aliases should only be used for specifying constraints since they will break the grouping.

view-entity.title: Virtual and Variant Product View Entity
